abstract.text: Model object representing a custom theme to be applied to the default message center.

inlineContent.text: To customize the message center theme:

abstract.text: The message cell separator style.
The dark mode title color for the “Mark Read” button.
The dark mode message cell tint color.

The background of the message view container.
